Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 13 Piṭṭhiduka » 13.16 Niyataduka » 13.16.7 Pañhāvāra
13.16.7.3 Paccayānulomapaccanīya
Piṭṭhiduka
Niyataduka
Pañhāvāra
Paccayānulomapaccanīya
343.
4788Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe cattāri, naadhipatiyā cattāri, naanantare nasamanantare cattāri, naaññamaññe dve, naupanissaye cattāri…pe…  nasampayutte dve, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā cattāri, novigate cattāri.
<< Suddhaup13.16.7.4 Paccayapaccanīyānuloma >>
